Mimi Hafida (amụrụ na 26 Ọgọọst 1965, Batna, Algeria ) bụ onye Algeria na-ede uri, onye nta akụkọ na onye na-ese ihe
O nwetara Prix Mohammed Dib n'afọ 2010 n'asụsụ Arabic maka nchịkọta ya, "Tales of the Aures"
"Tales of the Aures" bụ nchịkọta akụkọ, niile metụtara nchegbu ụmụaka na ọkachasị, nhụjuanya ha. Hafida abụrụla onye nta akụkọ na-agbasa ozi na Radio Aurès(fr) na Batna
A makwaara Hafida dị ka onye na-akpụ ihe, ọkachasị maka ọrụ ya site na iji pini Safety
Ọrụ ya a maara nke ọma bụ nchịkọta nke pini nchekwa na-emepụta nwanyị.
